# include<iostream>
using namespace std;
unsigned int max_val,min_val;
void maxmin(unsigned int a[],unsigned int n)
{
    min_val = max_val = a[0];
    for(int i = 1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]>max_val)
            max_val = a[i];
        else
            if(a[i]<min_val)
            min_val = a[i];
    }
}
int main()
{
unsigned int n,num_query;
cin>>n>>num_query;
cout<<endl;
unsigned int a[n],test_val[num_query];
for(int i = 0;i<n;i++)
cin>>a[i];
cout<<endl;
for(int i = 0;i<num_query;++i)
    cin>>test_val[i];
maxmin(a,n);
for(int i = 0;i<num_query;++i)
{
    if(test_val[i]<=max_val && test_val[i]>=min_val)
        cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"No"<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
